name: CUBOX (The Quest for Salad)
description:
A punishing 'rage' platformer made for the 2021 Ludwig Jam.

Make your way to the top to retrieve what you've always wanted the most... A bowl of salad.

Featuring:

- Dynamically changing music based on progress (or loss of)

- An autosave system

- Pain

Credits:

Gameplay & Design by DeliciousSalad

Music by RealBlananas

Non-credited sprite work by Assassinfouxx

Logo and box face by NikoKazMusic

Made in Unreal Engine 4

Resources:
